statements: UPDATE survey_responses_images SET status = 'approved' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE survey_responses_images SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE survey_responses_images SET status='approved' WHERE id=1234;
UPDATE survey_responses_images SET status='rejected', updated_at='2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE id=5678;
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE response_id = 1;

UPDATE survey_questions SET question_text = 'What is your favorite color?' WHERE question_id = 2;
